commit.message:
8370714: [lworld] Reimplement System.identityHashCode for Value Objects
The alternate hashcode method is enabled when the alternate subsitutability
method is enabled with: -XX:+UseAltSubstitutabilityMethod.
The IdentityHashCode is computed using map of field offsets and sizes.
The initial value is the hashcode of the object's class.
The value of each primitive fields is mixed in.
The hashCode of each reference is mixed in.
